topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: Yet Another IRC Bot
short_description: YAIB is a platform independent IRC bot, that can be used e.g. for channel management or anything else. It provides a simple API so that you can easily extend its functionality. (The included IRC API can soon also be used to write other IRC applications.)
